    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Naboji  na mizi</string>
            <string language="en">Charge on a tabletop</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung auf einer Tischplatte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Charge sur un dessus de table</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carga em um tabletop</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Carica su un ripiano del tavolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαπάνη tabletop</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Carga en un tablero de la mesa</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Naelektreno kroglo postavimo na mizo brez trenja, pod mizo pa še eno vendar fiksirano.</string>
            <string language="en">Charged sphere is attached to the spring on a frictionless table. Under the table another sphere exists but it is fixed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">coulombov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">coulomb's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrostatika</string>
            <string language="en">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belasteter Bereich wird zum Frühling auf einer 
frictionless Tabelle angebracht. Unter der Tabelle existiert ein
anderer Bereich, aber er ist örtlich festgelegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La sphère chargée est fixée au ressort sur une 
table sans friction. Sous la table une autre sphère existe mais
elle est fixe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A esfera carregada é unida à mola em uma tabela 
frictionless. Sob a tabela uma outra esfera existe mas é fixa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La sfera caricata è fissata alla molla di una 
tabella frictionless. Sotto la tabella un'altra sfera esiste ma 
è fissa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρεωμένη σφαίρα είναι συνδεμένη με το ελατήριο σε 
έναν χωρίς τριβή πίνακα. Στο πλαίσιο του πίνακα μια άλλη 
σφαίρα υπάρχει αλλά καθορίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La esfera cargada se asocia al resorte en un 
vector sin fricción. Bajo el vector otra esfera existe pero es 
fija.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Coulombs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος Coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del culombio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">electrostática</string>
          </keyword>
